titles: By the King. A proclamation offering his Majesties gracious pardon to all officers, gunners, armourers, gunsmiths, carpenters, wheele-wrights, and other artificers belonging to the Office of the Ordinance, and requiring their attendance at Oxford, before the eighteenth day of this instant March.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, Printer to the University,
notes: With royal coat of arms at head of text.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Oxford this seaventh of March, in the eighteenth yeare of Our Reigne.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Great Britain. --  Board of Ordnance --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
